meanings.definition: Not related to or involved in industry.
meanings.sent1: The small town had a peaceful, nonindustry atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The artist preferred a nonindustry lifestyle, focusing on creativity over profit.
meanings.sent3: The nonindustry picnic in the park was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her nonindustry approach to problem-solving brought fresh perspectives to the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonindustry mindset allowed for exploration of unconventional ideas.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of or suitable for industry.
meanings.sent1: The cozy cottage had a charming, nonindustry feel.
meanings.sent2: The vintage clothing store had a unique, nonindustry vibe.
meanings.sent3: The nonindustry fashion show featured handmade, one-of-a-kind pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her nonindustry taste in music introduced me to new genres and artists.
meanings.sent5: The nonindustry design of the garden was a refreshing change from the urban landscape.
